RXN_config_t Struct Reference

A structure for overriding configuration defaults / getting information from the server regarding leap seconds or GPS/Glonass clock offsets. More...

#include <RXN_structs.h>

Data Fields

S32 chip_expiry_from_TOE
 Nominal chipset ephemeris expiration after toe [default 7200 sec].
U16 ephemeris_duration
 Duration of predicted Keplarian ephemeris [default 300 sec].
U32 gps_time_next_leap
 GPS time [sec] of the next leap if known; otherwise the value is set to 0. Based on International Earth Rotation and Reference Systems Service (IERS) bulletin.
U08 leap_secs
 Current leap seconds between UTC and GPS.
U08 logging_level
 0 no logging, 1 error, 2 info, 3 debug, 4 full dump (including eph store) [default 1].
U32 min_seed_threshold
 Minimum time in seconds before a new SAGPS seed will be create. [default 50400 sec = 14hrs].
RXN_SAGPS_segment_flag_t sagps_orbit_segment_mask_glo
 The number of orbit segments to use when create an SAGPS seed for GLONASS [default all supported segments].
RXN_SAGPS_segment_flag_t sagps_orbit_segment_mask_gps
 The number of orbit segments to use when create an SAGPS seed for GPS [default all supported segments].
S32 tau_gps
 Fine GPS/UTC time corr scale factor 2^-30 [sec]: T_GPS = T_GLO + utc_offset + tauGPS + (t - tt_tau_gps) * tau_gps_dot.
S32 tau_gps_dot
 Fine GPS/UTC time corr drift factor 2^-49 [sec]: T_GPS = T_GLO + utc_offset + tauGPS + (t - tt_tau_gps) * tau_gps_dot.
S32 toe_buffer_offset
 Time offset [sec] between prediction buffer and last toe [default 0 sec].
U32 tt_tau_gps
 Time tag for tauGPS in absolute GPS sec.

Detailed Description

A structure for overriding configuration defaults / getting information from the server regarding leap seconds or GPS/Glonass clock offsets.

Note: the library does not use tau_gps or tt_tau_gps but provides it.

The library *does* need leap_secs for Glonass and will use gps_time_next_leap if not zero. The user is therefore advised not zero either of these out when calling RXN_Set_Config(). Note that PGPS seeds are synced to GPS time so calling RXN_Get_Ephemeris() is fine if PGPS seeds are available. For SA Glonass seeds, the value of leap_secs must be correct.

Note also the time-tag for tau_gps is provided; it varies slowly ~ 2m /week

For more information, please refer to the integrator's manual.

Since:
4.0.0

Field Documentation

S32 RXN_config_t::chip_expiry_from_TOE

Nominal chipset ephemeris expiration after toe [default 7200 sec].

U16 RXN_config_t::ephemeris_duration

Duration of predicted Keplarian ephemeris [default 300 sec].

U32 RXN_config_t::gps_time_next_leap

GPS time [sec] of the next leap if known; otherwise the value is set to 0. Based on International Earth Rotation and Reference Systems Service (IERS) bulletin.

U08 RXN_config_t::leap_secs

Current leap seconds between UTC and GPS.

U08 RXN_config_t::logging_level

0 no logging, 1 error, 2 info, 3 debug, 4 full dump (including eph store) [default 1].

U32 RXN_config_t::min_seed_threshold

Minimum time in seconds before a new SAGPS seed will be create. [default 50400 sec = 14hrs].

RXN_SAGPS_segment_flag_t RXN_config_t::sagps_orbit_segment_mask_glo

The number of orbit segments to use when create an SAGPS seed for GLONASS [default all supported segments].

RXN_SAGPS_segment_flag_t RXN_config_t::sagps_orbit_segment_mask_gps

The number of orbit segments to use when create an SAGPS seed for GPS [default all supported segments].

S32 RXN_config_t::tau_gps

Fine GPS/UTC time corr scale factor 2^-30 [sec]: T_GPS = T_GLO + utc_offset + tauGPS + (t - tt_tau_gps) * tau_gps_dot.

S32 RXN_config_t::tau_gps_dot

Fine GPS/UTC time corr drift factor 2^-49 [sec]: T_GPS = T_GLO + utc_offset + tauGPS + (t - tt_tau_gps) * tau_gps_dot.

S32 RXN_config_t::toe_buffer_offset

Time offset [sec] between prediction buffer and last toe [default 0 sec].

U32 RXN_config_t::tt_tau_gps

Time tag for tauGPS in absolute GPS sec.
